name: Blue Good - Red Bad
description:
Blue Good - Red Bad is a simple TDS (top-down-shooter) made in Game Maker Studio 2. It is not intended to be a serious game, but I may update it one day on a whim. 5 minute time-waster. I got a score of 470, you should be able to beat that ;P

Start - space
Move - WASD
Fire - left mouse button

Health packs have a green "H" on them and will restore you to full health. Some levels require you to pick up a blue key-card labelled, well, "key" to unlock the door

Increase your score by using health packs (even if you don't need them), killing enemies, and finding key cards - and remember:

BLUE GOOD  - RED BAD
